declarations.description: Custom element for the header on an album page.
declarations.name: AlbumHeaderCustomElement

members.name: findScrollableAncestor
members.description:
Returns the nearest ancestor that has overflow-y auto/scroll/overlay,
or null if none (viewport is the scroll context).

members.name: innerHTML
members.default:
`

${albumId}

${artistId}

2024 • 12 songs • 48 min

`

declarations.description: Custom element for an album image.
declarations.name: AlbumImageCustomElement

declarations.description:
Custom element for player controls displayed at the bottom of the screen.
This element is self-contained and manages all player logic internally.

The element is controlled entirely through HTML attributes. User interactions
(play/pause/next buttons, playlist selection) are handled internally. External
code can control playback by setting attributes and react to state changes via
the `change` event or `onchange` attribute.
declarations.name: PlaybarCustomElement

members.name: updateMediaSessionFromTrack
members.description:
Fetches ID3 tags from the track URL and updates Media Session metadata.
Used for lock screen / notification controls (title, artist, album, artwork).
Guards against race where the user switches tracks before the fetch completes.

members.name: seekAudioBy
members.description:
Seeks the audio element by deltaSeconds (positive = forward, negative = backward).
Clamps to [0, duration]. No-ops if no audio element or duration is not yet finite.

members.name: updateProgressIndicator
members.description: Updates the progress indicator element with current time and duration.

members.name: handleSeek
members.description:
Handles the seek event from progress-indicator-custom-element.
Sets the audio element's currentTime to the requested position.

members.name: handlePlayToggle
members.description:
Handles the play-toggle event from player-controls-custom-element.
Toggles play/pause for the current track, or stops playback if no track is set.

members.name: handlePlayNext
members.description:
Handles the play-next event from player-controls-custom-element.
Plays the next track in the album if available.

members.name: handlePlayPrev
members.description:
Handles the play-prev event from player-controls-custom-element.
Plays the previous track in the album if available.

members.name: loadAllAlbumTracks
members.description:
Load all tracks in the album for prev button functionality.
Filters out cover.jpeg files from the track list.

members.name: playToggle
members.description:
Play/Pause/Resume/Stop
There are 4 different scenarios this supports:
1. If a track is passed in that is not currently being played, it will start playing that track
2. If a track is passed in that is currently being played, it will pause
3. If a track is passed in that is the current track, but it's not currently playing, it will resume
4. If no track is passed in, it will stop playback

members.name: pause
members.description: Pause track

members.name: playNext
members.description: Play next track

members.name: playPrev
members.description: Play previous track

members.name: dispatchChangeEvent
members.description:
Dispatches a `change` event when player state changes.
Also calls the onchange attribute handler if set.

members.name: hasPreviousTrack
members.description: Whether there is a previous track (matching playPrev() logic).

members.name: setupEventListeners
members.description:
Sets up event listeners for all control buttons.

Attaches click event listeners to the previous, toggle, and next buttons
in the shadow DOM. This is called during `connectedCallback()` to ensure
listeners are active when the element is added to the DOM.

members.name: removeEventListeners
members.description:
Removes event listeners from all control buttons.

Detaches click event listeners from the previous, toggle, and next buttons
in the shadow DOM. This is called during `disconnectedCallback()` to prevent
memory leaks when the element is removed from the DOM.

members.name: handlePrevClick

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The click event from the previous button

members.description:
Handles clicks on the previous track button.

Stops event propagation and dispatches a `play-prev` custom event if the
button is enabled. The event only fires when `data-has-previous-track` is
set to "true", which enables the button.

members.name: handleToggleClick

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The click event from the toggle button

members.description:
Handles clicks on the play/pause toggle button.

Stops event propagation and dispatches a `play-toggle` custom event.
This event is always dispatched regardless of the current play state,
allowing parent elements to handle the toggle logic.

members.name: handleNextClick

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The click event from the next button

members.description:
Handles clicks on the next track button.

Stops event propagation and dispatches a `play-next` custom event if the
button is enabled. The event only fires when `data-has-next-track` is
set to "true", which enables the button.

declarations.description:
Custom element that displays a playlist button with a popup showing remaining tracks.

This element manages the state and UI for displaying remaining tracks in an album.
It loads tracks asynchronously based on the album URL and current track ID attributes,
and dispatches custom 'select' events when a track is chosen.
declarations.name: PlaylistCustomElement

members.name: albumUrl
members.description:
The album URL from the `data-album-url` attribute.
Used to fetch remaining tracks via `getRemainingAlbumTracks`.

members.name: currentTrackId
members.description:
The current track ID from the `data-current-track-id` attribute.
Used to filter out the current track from the remaining tracks list.

members.name: remainingTracks
members.description:
Array of remaining tracks in the album (excluding the current track).
Each track contains:
- `url`: The URL/path to the track file
- `title`: The display title of the track
- `trackNum`: The track number in the album

members.name: popoverOpen
members.description:
Whether the popover is currently open/visible.
Controls the visibility of the track list popup.

members.name: loadPromise
members.description:
Promise for the current track loading operation.
Used to debounce rapid attribute changes and prevent race conditions.

members.name: updateAttributes
members.description:
Updates internal state from element attributes and reloads tracks.

Reads the `data-album-url` and `data-current-track-id` attributes,
updates the corresponding private properties, renders the popover,
and asynchronously loads the remaining tracks.

members.name: loadTracks
members.description:
Loads the remaining tracks from the album asynchronously.

Fetches tracks using `getRemainingAlbumTracks` based on the current
`albumUrl` and `currentTrackId`. Implements debouncing to prevent
race conditions when attributes change rapidly. On error, sets
`remainingTracks` to an empty array.

If `albumUrl` or `currentTrackId` are missing, clears the tracks
and returns early.

members.name: handleButtonClick

parameters.name: e
parameters.description: The click event from the button

members.description:
Handles clicks on the playlist button.

Toggles the popover open/closed state. When opening, adds a document-level
click listener (with a slight delay to avoid immediate closure) to detect
clicks outside the element. When closing, removes the document listener.

members.name: handleDocumentClick

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The click event from the document

members.description:
Handles document-level clicks to close the popover when clicking outside.

Checks if the click occurred outside the element using the event's
composed path. If the click was inside the element (including shadow DOM),
the popover remains open. Otherwise, closes the popover and removes
the document listener.

members.name: handleTrackClick

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The click event from a track button

members.description:
Handles clicks on individual track items in the playlist.

Extracts the track index from the button's `data-track-idx` attribute,
retrieves the corresponding track from `remainingTracks`, and dispatches
a custom 'select' event with the track details. Closes the popover after
selection.

The dispatched event has the following structure:
```typescript
{
  type: 'select',
  detail: {
    url: string,
    title: string,
    trackNum: number
  },
  bubbles: true
}
```

members.name: renderPopover
members.description:
Renders the popover UI based on current state.

Updates the button disabled state, popover visibility, and track list.
Cleans up previous event listeners before rebuilding the track list to
prevent memory leaks. Shows a "No other tracks" message when there are
no remaining tracks.

The button is disabled when `albumUrl` is not set. The popover is only
visible when both `popoverOpen` is true and `albumUrl` is set.

Each track button includes:
- The track title (with ellipsis for overflow)
- A chevron-right icon
- A `data-track-idx` attribute for identifying the track

declarations.description:
Custom element for track progress and seeking.
Renders a thin scrub bar; click or drag to seek.
declarations.name: ProgressIndicatorCustomElement

declarations.description:
Custom element for client-side app navigation. Use href for the route;
slot content is the link label.
declarations.name: NavLinkCustomElement

members.name: tryNavigate
members.description: Returns true if fragment navigation was performed (caller should preventDefault).

declarations.name: _testResetPopstateState
declarations.description: Resets popstate registration state for tests. Not for production use.

Custom element for a track list item. Handles loading the track duration
and displays track information including name, artist, track number, and duration.
declarations.name: TracklistItemCustomElement

members.name: setTrackDuration

parameters.name: _evt
parameters.description: The event that triggered this callback (unused).

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: The HTMLAudioElement containing the loaded audio metadata.

members.description:
Sets the track duration from audio metadata and updates the display.

Validates the duration value and formats it as "MM:SS" before updating
the duration element in the DOM.

members.name: loadTrackDuration

parameters.name: trackUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the audio file to load metadata from.

members.description:
Loads track duration metadata from the audio file URL.

Creates an HTMLAudioElement with preload set to "metadata" to efficiently
load only the metadata needed for duration. Handles both successful loads
and errors (including HTTP 416 Range Not Satisfiable).

members.name: clickHandler
members.description:
Handles click events on the track item.

Dispatches a custom `track-click` event with the decoded track URL
in the event detail. The event bubbles up the DOM tree.

members.name: innerHTML
members.default:
`
${this.trackNumber}
${this.trackName}
${this.trackArtist}
${this.trackDuration || " "}
`

declarations.description:
Custom element for the upload dialog.

Provides a trigger button that opens a modal for selecting and uploading files.
The modal is rendered into the element's shadow root (IDs stay scoped).
Before submit, selected files are listed with name and size; users can remove
individual files. ID3 metadata (artist, album, title, track number, cover art)
is loaded per file and shown when available. Submit sends the current list.
Supports optional trigger styling via the `class` and `buttonStyle` attributes.
declarations.name: UploadDialogCustomElement

members.name: #selectedFiles
members.description: Selected files drive the list and submit; single source of truth.

members.name: #close
members.description: Hide modal and cleanup. Called from dialog 'close' event (Escape, close button, backdrop).

declarations.description:
Custom element for a single file row in the upload dialog file list.

Displays file name, size, and loads ID3 metadata. Dispatches `upload-dialog-remove`
when the remove button is clicked. Used only by upload-dialog-custom-element.
declarations.name: UploadDialogFileItemCustomElement

members.name: file
members.description: The file to display. When set, updates the UI and starts ID3 loading.

members.name: fileKey
members.description: Stable key for this file (name-size-lastModified).

members.name: metadata
members.description: Current editable metadata (for upload dialog to collect on submit).
